meta.explain: Prioritized 5 tasks. Critical issue (login crash) identified as P0.

prioritized_tasks.reasoning: Login crash affects all users, production incident, must fix immediately
Database upgrade is infrastructure work, blocks other optimization tasks
Performance optimization is important but not urgent, depends on t4
New feature is business requirement, but no urgent deadline
Documentation update is lower priority, can be done in between other tasks

recommendations: Handle login crash (t1) immediately - this is a P0 incident
Complete t4 before starting t2 to avoid wasted work
t3 can be developed in parallel, not blocked by other tasks
Suggest assigning t5 to new team member or completing during meeting gaps
data.rationale: Applied urgency-importance matrix with dependency analysis. Login crash ranked highest due to production impact and immediate deadline. Database upgrade prioritized before query optimization due to explicit dependency.
